channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OnlyFans owner has made $1 billion in dividends since 2021
item.description: OnlyFans Ltd. has been growing rapidly since the start of the pandemic, with its owner raking in $1 billion in dividends over the last three years.

item.title: Super Micro Computer is among the most oversold names on the Street. Here are the others
item.description: These stocks could be due for a bounce after a strong investor selling.

item.title: College-loan relief has become a political football. Borrowers are losing hope.
Zuck is winning 2024: No one has gained more wealth this year than Mark Zuckerberg, who is up $56 billion
item.description: With Nvidia stock dropping this week, Zuckerberg overtook his fellow tech CEO Jensen Huang.

item.title: Home listings are up more than 60% in some cities. Here's where
item.description: Nationwide, active listings in August were up 36% compared with the same month last year, according to a new report from Realtor.com.

item.title: Broadcom’s stock is on track for its worst session since 2020
I’ve led multiple tech ventures. This is the biggest mistake startup leaders make
item.description: Startup leaders obsessed with valuations and technology overlook something more important at their peril.

item.title: Harris wants a 28% capital gains tax rate for top earners. Here's what advisors are telling clients
item.description: Vice President Harris proposed a 28% tax on long-term capital gains for households making more than $1 million. Here's what financial advisors recomme...

item.title: S&P 500 risks worst week since April even as U.S. stocks make gains early Friday
Darktrace CEO and former Mike Lynch protégé Poppy Gustafsson steps down before $5.3 billion takeover completes
item.description: Darktrace announced cofounder Gustafsson, who worked for Mike Lynch at Autonomy, would be stepping down with immediate effect.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Intel, Nio, Super Micro Computer and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Quarter- or half-point interest-rate cut this month now close call for Fed
In 6 years I’ve bootstrapped my moving company to $100M in revenue. Avoiding VC funding has been key
item.description: Piece of Cake Moving has grown from one truck to more than 350 under founder and CEO Voyo Popovic.

item.title: Fed Governor Waller backs interest rate cut at September meeting, open to larger move
item.description: Waller on Friday backed an interest rate cut at the upcoming policy meeting, noting the importance of supporting a weakening jobs picture.

item.title: Fed futures indicate half-point rate cut now likelier than not later this month
